categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Kosh was a Human male Jedi Padawan of Master Bacara who served the Jedi Order during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire.

Around 3640 BBY, Kosh and Bacara were stationed at the Kri-Ta Outpost in the Pelath-Ri Marches on Voss. Upon finding ancient Jedi technology in the old ruins, they were ambushed by Gormak and Bacara ordered Kosh to flee before being killed by a single shot in the head. Wounded, Kosh made it back to the outpost and asked a Republic-allied individual to complete the task the Jedi started.
